member_organisations:
National sections as listed on www.aej.org 
Plus AEJ Armenia 
AEJ Greece 
AEJ Poland
fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Enlargement, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Digital economy and society
head_office_address: Press Club Europe Rue Froissart 95 Bruxelles
eu_initiatives: Public consultation and formation of High Level Group on fake news and online disinformation;
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Observer status at Council of Europe Steering Committee on Media and Information Society, CDMSI, since 2008
goals__remit: Promoting free, independent and high quality journalism and media in Europe, safeguarding the welfare of journalists as professionals, engaging with EU institutions and bodies for the above goals, and promoting the AEJ as a network for sharing knowledge, skills and mutual support of members
